Review.Titre: I have no idea why this spam cookie…
Review.Contenu: I have no idea why this spam cookie factory emailed me. Why don't you guys bother someone else?

Review.Titre: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY
Review.Contenu: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY. THERE IS NO TRANSPARECY AT ALL AND THE SYSTEM THAT THEY USE IS NOT TRANSPARENT. BILLING IS NOT CORRECT AND THE CUSTOMER IS FORCED TO TRUST THAT THEY ARE NOT BILLING YOU FOR ROBO CALLS OR SLOW LONG WINDED AGENTS THAT TAKE THERE TIME ( AT A NOT TO CHEAP RATE) HANDLING YOUR CALLS.NO OPTION TO LISTEN TO YOUR MESAGES ( TO CONFIRM THE CALL) SALES DOES A HORRIBLE JOB OF EDUCATING THE CUSTOMER AND AS A RESULT THEY ARE NOT TO KEEN ON FOLLOW UP AFTER THEY DUPE YOU INTO AN AGREEMENT THAT HAS A LOT OF LOOP HOLES FOR THEM TO BILL AS THEY PLEASE AND VERY LITTLE ACCOUNTABILITY FOR WHAT IS SAID AND OR PROMISED.

You are an answering service, However you don't answer the phone. It goes to a machine and then when they pick up the call they are half asleep or just uninterested in speaking with our Clients. I am looking into maybe better services for my answering needs. I'm not sure how I feel about what I hear.

We cannot read your bills, the billing system stinks!  You need a new system.  You bill backwards and it is confusing.,  The fact that we can't pay by credit card without being charged for it is horrendous.  we were threatened to be cut off last month when I went over everything with Jarod and we were preparing to send in the balance.  the email was rude, and we were not treated like a customer that has been with you several years.  When we do use you, the girls are terrific but it is the billing system and the billing people in charge that make us think we should go another way!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I am getting a lot of complaints from my customers, and this is not the first time, I have been considering getting another service.  Your company is not paying attention, please advise
correct your billing system, accept credit cards without addding to  your already expensive sercie.

Review.Titre: There is always a lack of…
Review.Contenu: There is always a lack of professionalism when i call in and inquire about our account.

Review.Titre: Take too long to answer the phone

Review.Contenu: Several weeks into the process, we are still working out the kinks.  Response time is slow, and the follow up is passive rather than active. I am on the verge of searching for a new service.

Review.Titre: I feel the people who answer the phone…Don't Care
Review.Contenu: I feel the people who answer the phone need to be professional sounding and speak clearly.  Sound and act as if they love what they are doing and this is not just a "job"

Review.Titre: It is a reacquiring problem that our…
Review.Contenu: It is a reacquiring problem that our calls take an unacceptable time to answer. We have called on several occasions to verify and the complaint hold true. I have asked for a manager to call to rectify and I get no follow up.
very professionalinteresting tracking of all incoming callscommunication within the service itself is not always the bestquite expensive, but within market rates it seems
Answer the phone more promptly. Out clients complain about being on hold for long periods if time.

These are all different issues that we have experienced:Some messages are sent with incomplete information. Our Customer's account number is not captured. The company name is misspelled making it harder to look them up if the Customer number is not provided. The full message is not provided and when we listen to the recording there is critical information mentioned that would have been helpful at the time the message was received. There isnt a mention of you being our answering service so our Customer thinks they are speaking with us. These issues are not occurring back to back but often enough to mention for quality assurance. If specific examples are needed, they can be found in our history. I will mention that when i have the time to report a specific example, I receive a response pretty quickly. The problem is I dont have the time to report each one.

Review.Titre: We have received complaints that long…
Review.Contenu: We have received complaints that long delays before the call is answered and transferred, also rude it some situations.

Review.Titre: We are constantly having issue with not…
Review.Contenu: We are constantly having issue with not getting calls, not calling the proper phone number to dispatcher and not following protocols.

Review.Titre: We have had instances of not receiving…
Review.Contenu: We have had instances of not receiving priority phone calls from patients and/or commercial clients.
Service is appreciated. Clients have told us that the hold time is a little lengthy but besides that our callers have a great experience.

Review.Titre: Answering Service Care has saved me time & hassle
Review.Contenu: Answering Service Care has saved me tons of time and hassle by answering incoming calls, scheduling clients, and handling messages. Knowing that calls will be answered by a live agent 24/7, in English and Spanish, gives me peace of mind.Additionally, when there have been mistakes or service issues, ASC has responded promptly!
There's sometimes confusion in accessing the app for providers, but overall our experience has been good. They are easy to work with. We've been customers for 3 years.

Review.Titre: only complaint at this time is…
Review.Contenu: only complaint at this time is customers telling us they stay on hold for too long.
Good service thus far. We've used for a few years. No complaints.
Employees are professional, knowledgeable and always willing to assist.  We have been with Answering Service Care for 25+ years and appreciate the partnership. Wonderful service. Outstanding care.

It is nice to be able to leave the office everyday at 5pm and not have to worry about your customer's being taken care of. The Answering Service staff are professional and they truly are the best ones we have ever had!

Review.Titre: Answering Service for a busy Medical Practice
Review.Contenu: We have tried other answering services none of them compared to Answering Service Care. They have excellent phone skills, our patient's are never left on hold. The calls are answered by the 3rd ring. The messages are well taken and complete. Best of all they screen the calls very well knowing what is a true emergency or not.

Review.Titre: Thank you for all you do
Review.Contenu: Thank you for all you do.  It makes our lives much easier

Review.Titre: I had an issue with the protocol for our phone message retrievals.
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with the protocol for our message retrieval. Spoke with Maria, the account manager in Client Relations, and she handled my concerns in a professional manner, extremely courteous, empathetic, and very kind. She fixed our account and I am so happy to be able to work with the Answering Service Care company again! I used to be an agent with them 10 years ago and still use skills taught from this company in my every day life. They are the best answering service company nationwide! I highly recommend to anyone who needs this service for their businesses. You will not be disappointed!

We have been using ASC for almost two year now. They have a wonderful staff that is always helpful. Our phones are answered and messages are sent to us with the person's name, call back number, and the person's message. I would definitely recommend them if you need help answering your business phone. We mostly use them for after-hours and weekends. I will say some agents are better than others, but that's normal.

Review.Titre: Best decision to go with Answering Service
Review.Contenu: We made the switch to answering service care and have never looked back. It was very hard answering the phone at our busy child care and we were getting tons of solicitations which was wasting a lot of time. We have it at 3 of our buildings and don't plan to go back to answering the phone ever again!

we love being able to clock-off and know that our calls will be answered! we appreciate the time and effort saved by using this service! fair prices for an endless amount of growth, definitely worth it!

Review.Titre: Answering Service Care has been great…
Review.Contenu: Answering Service Care has been great for my answering phone calls from potential clients. I was able to customize my call script and they send me a detailed report of every call right to my email. Recommended!

Review.Titre: there do a fantastic job scheduling my…
Review.Contenu: there do a fantastic job scheduling my patients for so I don't have to rely on in house staff who can then be doing other things

They represent my company in a professional manner to all of my customers. They follow up to make sure I have received the information.  This helps to ensure customers do not slip through the cracks during a busy week. Best service I have added to my business to date. Thanks You!!

Review.Titre: 15 years with Answering Service and we are not moving !!
Review.Contenu: We love Answering Service Care  We have been using them for over 15 years and never had an issue.  If we have any questions, they answer us as quickly as possible.  They are open to suggestions and will do whatever they can to help us.  In this world of quick changing employees, it is once to know we have someone we can count on

We had been with Answering Care Service for 8-10 years. The service has always been consistent.The fees are fair. Our messages are received timely and when you call for help you get a friendly professional capable of answering our questions the first time.They have become a valuable extension to our offices in California and Colorado.We look forward to continued relationship with Answering Care Service.

Review.Titre: I really like how when I send emails
Review.Contenu: I really like how when I send emails, one person and sometimes two, email me right back with in 10 minutes to let me know that they received my request and have added or deleted an employee.  They deliver excellent customer service!

Review.Titre: What a great team at Answering Service Care
Review.Contenu: I have been with Answering Service Care for the entire 15 years I have been in business. What a great choice to choose them to be my call center representation. The professionalism has been outstanding and if there are any issues, they are quick to resolve them. What a dynamite team.

Review.Titre: Great service for any small business
Review.Contenu: I own a small plumbing company just east of LA. My business is my livelihood; and I trust the team at Answering Service Care with my business. Their teams truly care about my callers and about doing a great job for my company. I get compliments routinely on the "nice receptionist" I have at my office. They are so good it's almost transparent. I recommend Answering Service Care to anyone looking for a great impression for their business' calls.

Great customer service! My consultant addressed all our needs from beginning to end, with great follow-up and ensured we had all the information we needed for start-up and answered all questions quickly.

Review.Titre: This is the great service I ever had
Review.Contenu: This is the great service I ever had. Thess people are nice and my clients have always a positive experience with them.
Their service has made our business work great! Always happy to answer our questions or concerns!

Review.Titre: In my opinion We Care Answering Service…Totally Awesome
Review.Contenu: In my opinion We Care Answering Service staff is very helpful and understanding. Their were times that I had to resend information to them that was corrected. They responded accepted the corrections without hesitation. They were prompt with the outcome.

Review.Titre: As a customer for 10+ years I am very…
Review.Contenu: As a customer for 10+ years I am very satisfied with the service I've  receive; however, I've had to have conversations with management to iorn out some issues relating to length of time before the phone is answered. Hopefully the matter is resolved.
Professional staff. Very few problems. If we have a concern it is quickly fixed. Highly recommend their services.

Review.Titre: Always responsive and able to complete…
Review.Contenu: Always responsive and able to complete any request in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: This business is surrounded by many…
Review.Contenu: This business is surrounded by many long term caring people with state of the art advanced technology.
Confident that our customer's messages are sent to the correct place when we are not in the office and are always sent according to our instructions.
I'm very satisfied with them. Easy to use, and it helps my workflow a lot. I would definitely recommend it to other companies as well.

Review.Titre: Answering Service Care representatives are professional and caring.
Review.Contenu: Answering Service Care representatives are very professional when answering our calls.  It is the first and most important contact to the foundation. The ASC representative represents our foundation. It's important that a cancer patient receives care when calling CMC when trying to reach Cancer of Many Colors staff for assistance. Thanks Answering Service Care.
Quality messages from clients speaking in Spanish and English.Easy to communicate w/ and update ASC

Review.Titre: Easy to work with and reliable
Review.Contenu: Easy to work with and reliable! They are also quick to adjust and adapt to changes.

Review.Titre: Answers my calls in a professional…
Review.Contenu: Answers my calls in a professional manner,  gives me the message in a text message and email in a timely manner

Review.Titre: Once we got past the initial start up…
Review.Contenu: Once we got past the initial start up glitches a few year ago, they've been great. Easy to contact, easy to make any changes and great pricing.
They are very professional & the price is good

Review.Titre: Very efficient and timely reporting of…
Review.Contenu: Very efficient and timely reporting of messages. Extremely helpful to have messages both texted and emailed simultaneously.

Review.Titre: We are extremely happy to have the…
Review.Contenu: We are extremely happy to have the service, especially when the busyness of the day gets the best of us, and we are not able to receive calls, having this service helps us to keep track of important communications
Best answering service, this company is the best
Very friendly helpful and knowledgeable solved the problem quickly!
Very happy with Answering Service and the helpful staff.

Review.Titre: Answering the calls and sending the…
Review.Contenu: Answering the calls and sending the messages on time

Review.Titre: Maria Smith does a great job for my…
Review.Contenu: Maria Smith does a great job for my company every time.
Great experience. They keep those messages coming.
Great company, good service, and nice people.
All Operators are always very professional and courteous. All information for all messages is always received in the message.
Good service at a reasonable price

Review.Titre: We have depended on ASC for years
Review.Contenu: We have depended on ASC for years. It has been great for our small non profit.
Great to work with! Been using them for years!
Excellent customer Service and amazing support team as well !
fast, responsive, helpful
Considerate and knowledgeable employees
